display.title: Flux-Infused Elytra
display.description:
&nElytra&r

Brakes when the user crouches in the air.

Empowered: Uses flux energy to constantly propel the user, similar to continuously using firework rockets.

&nController&r

Unempowering or empowering the controller will also unempower or empower the equipped elytra. Using the controller will boost the user, similar to using a single firework rocket. If the user is on the ground, using the controller will allow them to easily take off in the direction they are looking.
